BlackjackGame class: if BlackjackPlayer's Hand instance is blackjack: resolve ante bet
while points less than 21, offer play options of double or hit; rejecting both offers is a stand.
Hand class: return point value; pass offers to player
BlackjackPlayer class: to double, increase the bet for this hand and return true; to hit, return true

BlackjackGame class: if over 21, the hand is a bust
BlackjackTable class: resolve the ante as a loss
